title: Hour 1: Lebr-on Top of the World?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Jay Williams react to Lebron's 2-year extension with the Lakers and discuss how it might impact Kyrie Irving this season. Jeff Saturday and Bart Scott join the show to debate if Aaron Rodgers was right to call out the Packers young wide receivers. Plus, with Bill Belichick refusing to name offensive and defensive coordinators this season, how much pressure is he under? Stephen A. and the crew go head to head.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: What does Lebron's extension with the Lakers mean for the league?
